resources.string:
Change log:

 0.8.0 beta - 2016-04-29
 - support opencaching.ro
 
 0.7.6 beta - 2016-04-28
 - fix: last logs and waypoints from geocaching.com
 
 0.7.5 beta - 2014-10-30
 - fix: last logs from geocaching.com
 
 0.7.4 beta - 2014-07-15
 - Added french translation, thanks to Nam
 
 0.7.3 beta - 2014-06-25
 - implement geokrety.org API changes
 
 0.7.2 beta - 2014-04-28
 - fix date parsing in Geocaching.com
 
 0.7.1 beta - 2014-03-02
 - rename "profile" to "user",
 - some fixes
 
 0.7.0 beta - 2014-02-25
 - support for geocaching.com (own your risk!)
 
 0.6.2 beta - 2014-02-20
 - log GeoKret validation,
 - some fixes
 
 0.6.1 beta - 2014-02-13
 - fix crash on drafts screen
 
 0.6.0 beta - 2014-02-12
 - refreshing in background,
 - live tracking code verification,
 - live waypoint resolving
 
 0.5.5 beta - 2014-02-06
 - manually add to inventory fix,
 - send all drafts button,
 - remove all saved logs button
 
 0.5.3 beta - 2014-01-18
 - English translation update, thanks to Mr.Yuck
 
 0.5.2 beta - 2014-01-17
 - some fixes
 
 0.5.1 beta - 2014-01-16
 - German translation update, thanks to Schrottie,
 - some fixes
 
 0.5.0 beta - 2014-01-15
 - log is being submitted in the background
 
 0.4.2 beta - 2014-01-06
 - some fixes and layout improvements,
 - German translation update, thanks to Schrottie
 
 0.4.1 beta - 2014-01-05
 - fix crash after upgrade from 0.2.1 to 0.4.0 version
 
 0.4.0 beta - 2014-01-05
 - works with third-party QR code scanners,
 - add home location,
 - QuickFind like Locus integration
 
 0.3.0 beta - 2014-01-04
 - add GeoKret into inventory manually,
 - log GeoKret on GPS location
 
 0.2.1 beta - 2013-12-29
 - German translation, thanks to Schrottie
 
 0.2.0 beta - 2013-12-29
 - add support for .de, .us, .nl and .org.uk
 
 0.1.2 beta - 2013-12-26
 - inventory refresh fix,
 - yes/no/cancel save account changes,
 - back to main activity after log successful
 
 0.1.1 beta - 2013-12-25
 - date and time clean fields - fix
 
 0.1.0 beta - 2013-12-25
 - rotation safe,
 - use secid instead of login and password
 
 0.0.2 alpha - 2013-12-17
 - polish translation,
 - about activity,
 - interface improvements
 
 0.0.1 alpha - 2013-12-14
 - first version with public .apk file,
 - fix problem with Android 4.x
 
 0.0.0 alpha - 2013-12-13
 - first public version, 
 - works only with Android 2.1-2.3.x.
